subject: Basketball
College Athletics
lead_paragraph: Laziness made Antoine Agudio work to develop from a catch-and-shoot guy into a diversified basketmaker who entered the weekend leading the N.C.A.A. in scoring.
snippet: Laziness made Antoine Agudio work to develop from a catch-and-shoot guy into a diversified basketmaker who entered the weekend leading the N.C.A.A. in scoring.
